title: Bloody Roar The Fang

description:
Description :
        Those who manipulate the power of “beastification” that transforms into a beast, they are called “beast people”. A high school girl, Mashiro, who was involved in a certain bizarre incident, to know the existence of the mysterious power that dwells in herself. Furthermore, a mysterious man named Fang appears before her...! ?


- Google translated from Amazon, sorry about that
